nested_items.name: apps
nested_items.description: The application summaries.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the application.

nested_items.name: importedAppId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the application.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message related to the status of the application.

nested_items.name: replicationConfigurationStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the replication configuration.

nested_items.name: replicationStatus
nested_items.description: The replication status of the application.

nested_items.name: replicationStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message related to the replication status of the application.

nested_items.name: latestReplicationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the application's most recent successful replication.

nested_items.name: launchConfigurationStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the launch configuration.

nested_items.name: launchStatus
nested_items.description: The launch status of the application.

nested_items.name: launchStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message related to the launch status of the application.

nested_items.name: launchDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the latest launch of the application.

nested_items.name: latestLaunchTime
nested_items.description: The latest time that this application was launched successfully.

nested_items.name: stackName
nested_items.description: The name of the latest stack launched for this application.

nested_items.name: stackId
nested_items.description: The ID of the latest stack launched for this application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the application.

nested_items.name: lastModified
nested_items.description: The last modified time of the application.

nested_items.name: roleName
nested_items.description: The name of the service role in the customer's account used by Server Migration Service.

nested_items.name: totalServerGroups
nested_items.description: The number of server groups present in the application.

nested_items.name: totalServers
nested_items.description: The number of servers present in the application.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token required to retrieve the next set of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
